reviews.text: Hernandez Pool Plaster & Remodeling 863 Rainbow Trail, Grapevine, TX 76051 Transform your pool into a stunning oasis with our expert plastering and tile work! 🌟 From Grapevine to Carrollton, Hernandez Pool Plaster is here to make your backyard dreams come true. Explore your options today! Visit HernandezPoolPlaster.com for more info.

"Great, fast, and reliable service, would reccomend for any pool work 👍👍" "Hernandez Pool did work for me, great quality and fair pricing "Highly recommend great workmanship!"

Thank you Tony and your crew for the amazing remodel job on our pool!! We are so glad we didn’t fill it in! You changed our old, cold, hard to clean deep diving pool into an oasis of fun!! Our family has used the pool more now after the … More

Never in my life have i been more pleased with a business and their work in my life. The job was done well before the finish date they have given me. To top it all off, the pricing was some of the best in the dfw metroplex. If you’re looking to get your pool plastered this is definitely the company to go with. Highly recommended, quality work! My pool needed plaster, Tile, and mastic all replaced. Hernandez pool plaster was able to replace all three for less than the other quotes I received for just … More Response from the owner 11 months ago Thank you, Tristan, for your fantastic review! We're thrilled to hear that you are satisfied with our work and that we could help remodel your pool within your budget. We look forward to assisting you with any future pool projects.
